ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was supported by grants from the National Institutes of Health: DA034978 (DMS), DA031074 (RG), AI93163 (SRM), AI43638 (SJL), AI106039 (SJL), AI100665 (DMS), AI110181 (JOW), AI74621 (SJL), DA031031 (KDW), DA019829 (SAS), DA027772 (SAS), DA023877 (SAS), DA029008 (TLP), MH065849 (TLP), and DA028692 (KCB), UCSD CFAR (AI036214); and the California HIV-1 Research Program (CHRP) RN07-SD-702, F13-SD-321 (AC). Additional support was provided by the Department of Veterans Affairs, James B. Pendleton Charitable Trust, and the Bettencourt-Schueller Foundation. Funders did not have any role in study design, data collection, data analysis, interpretation, or writing of the report.
